ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well honestly, the nerfs to Donals are NOT justified, in my opinion, because they have stated that many of the Velious mobs were designed with those BPs in
ygData.messageBody:
Well honestly, the nerfs to Donals are NOT justified, in my opinion, because
they have stated that many of the Velious mobs were designed with those BPs
in mind. They hit for ungodly amounts and quickly and have insane amouts of
HP themselves like 200k. If they downscale these mobs then maybe I would
support the nerf but if not, well the increase in CR time alone will begin
to make the game unpalatable to me. But then I'm in a bad mood today :P

Halana/Tani

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
> Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 1:35 PM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Changes on Test for all Classes.
>
>
> I'd heard about the nerf to Donal's which is probably well
> justified, but
> not about Complete Heal. What are they planning on doing to
> Complete Heal?
>
> I see the Eq Casters' post said defensive skillS, wonder if
> they really
> meant Defense skill only? I can think of some other minor
> tweaks I'd like
> to see to bard skills, skill caps come to mind.
>
> Kit
